param.name: template_id
param.doc: The ID of the associated connector template.

param.name: variable_name
param.doc: (Optional) One or more variable substitutions, where {variable_name} is the placeholder that will be replaced with the given value.

method.name: GET
method.doc: To retrieve a connector instruction set with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the connector instructions resource URI. Variables within the returned XML will be surrounded by curly braces, and can be substituted with values via query string parameters.

request.doc:
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/mga/connector_instructions/1
Variable substitution where {hostname} is replaced with 'ibm.com' GET https://{appliance_hostname}/mga/connector_instructions/1?hostname=ibm.com

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: Accept-Language:locale
param.doc: Request the instructions for the given locale.

response.doc:
200 OK
The instructions XML file text
The requested connector instruction set does not exist. The JSON message indicates which connector instruction set was requested.
